comment.body:
Hello! Is there a simple solution how to get values returned by ZeroFrame API commands not using callbacks? If I want to make some sequential actions with API I must create a dozen of nested callbacks. I cant create wrapper with API call inside and reuse this code in several complex methods instead I create a chain of nested callbacks in every method.
I.e. how can I make something like this: 
var key = this.cmd("userPublickey", [])
Or this is impossible because ZeroFrame API is asynchronous by design?
